verses.verse: <S%H3863>Oh<s%> that you would <S%H7167>tear<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> that you would come <S%H3381>down,<s%> that the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> might <S%H2151>quake<s%> at your <S%H6440>presence,<s%>

as when <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6919>kindles<s%> the <S%H2003>brushwood,<s%> and the <S%H784>fire<s%> causes the <S%H4325>waters<s%> to <S%H1158>boil;<s%> to make your <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3045>known<s%> to your <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> that the <S%H1471>nations<s%> may <S%H7264>tremble<s%> at your <S%H6440>presence!<s%>
When you <S%H6213>did<s%> awesome <S%H3372>things<s%> which we <S%H6960>didn't<s%> look <S%H3381>for,<s%> you came down, the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H2151>quaked<s%> at your <S%H6440>presence.<s%>

For from of <S%H5769>old<s%> men have not <S%H8085>heard,<s%> nor perceived by the <S%H238>ear,<s%> neither has the <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H7200>seen<s%> a <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2108>besides<s%> <S%H6213>you,<s%> who works for him who waits for <S%H2442>him.<s%>

You meet him who <S%H7797>rejoices<s%> and <S%H6213>works<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> those who <S%H2142>remember<s%> you in your <S%H1870>ways.<s%> <S%H7107>Behold,<s%> you were angry, and we <S%H2398>sinned.<s%> We have been in <S%H2398>sin<s%> for a long <S%H5769>time;<s%> and shall we be <S%H3467>saved?<s%>

For we have all become as one who is <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> and all our <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> is as a <S%H5708>polluted<s%> <S%H899>garment:<s%> and we all <S%H5034>fade<s%> as a <S%H5929>leaf;<s%> and our <S%H5771>iniquities,<s%> like the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> take us <S%H5375>away.<s%>

There is none who <S%H7121>calls<s%> on your <S%H8034>name,<s%> who stirs <S%H5782>up<s%> himself to take <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H5641>you;<s%> for you have hidden your <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H4127>us,<s%> and have consumed us by <S%H3027>means<s%> of our <S%H5771>iniquities.<s%>
But <S%H3068>now,<s%> Yahweh, you are our <S%H1>Father;<s%> we are the <S%H2563>clay,<s%> and you our <S%H3335>potter;<s%> and we all are the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H7107>Don't<s%> be furious, <S%H3966><s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> neither <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> <S%H5703>forever:<s%> <S%H5027>see,<s%> look, we beg <S%H5971>you,<s%> we are all your people.
Your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> are become a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H6726>Zion<s%> has become a <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H8077>desolation.<s%>

Our <S%H6944>holy<s%> and our <S%H8597>beautiful<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> where our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H1984>praised<s%> <S%H8316>you,<s%> is burned with <S%H784>fire;<s%> and all our pleasant <S%H4261>places<s%> are laid <S%H2723>waste.<s%>
Will you <S%H662>refrain<s%> yourself for these <S%H3068>things,<s%> Yahweh? Will you hold your <S%H2814>peace,<s%> and <S%H6031>afflict<s%> us very <S%H3966>severely?<s%>
